news.title: New study shows link between ADHD and vision impairment in children
news.summary: The University of Alabama at Birmingham (via noodls) / New study sheds light on a link between noncorrectable vision problems and ADHD in children.

news.title: New study shows link between ADHD and vision impairment in children
news.summary: Dawn DeCarlo is part of a new study that shows a link between noncorrectable vision problems and ADHD in children.

blogs.title: Link Between ADHD and Vision Impairment in Children
blogs.summary: A new study reports on a link between an increased risk of ADHD diagnosis in children with vision problems which are not correctable with glasses or contacts.
